SELECT SEQ_ILGL_ACTN_CTNT.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO T_LNDS_ILGL_ACTN_CTNT01M1 ( ILGL_ACTN_CTNT_SEQ, ILGL_PRVU_INFO_SEQ, ACTN_DTTM, ACTN_CTNT, FSTTM_RGSR_ID, FSTTM_RGST_DTTM, LSTTM_MODFR_ID, LSTTM_ALTR_DTTM, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{ilglActnCtntSeq}, #{ilglPrvuInfoSeq}, #{actnDttm}, #{actnCtnt}, #{fsttmRgsrId}, SYSDATE, #{lsttmModfrId}, SYSDATE, NVL(#{useYn}, 'Y') )

SELECT SEQ_ILGL_ATTFL.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO T_LNDS_ILGL_ATTFL01M1 ( ILGL_ATTFL_SEQ, ILGL_PRVU_ADDR_SEQ, ATTFL_NM, ATTFL_PATH, ATTFL_CPCT, OCRN_DATES ) VALUES ( #{ilglAttflSeq}, #{ilglPrvuAddrSeq}, #{attflNm}, #{attflPath}, #{attflCpct}, #{ocrnDates} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rn, t.* FROM ( SELECT MAX(ILGL_PRVU_INFO_SEQ) as ilglPrvuInfoSeq, LNDS_UNQ_NO as lndsUnqNo, MAX(LNDS_LDNO_ADDR) as lndsLdnoAddr, MAX(GPS_LGTD) as gpsLgtd, MAX(GPS_LTTD) as gpsLttd, MAX(OCRN_DATES) as ocrnDates FROM T_LNDS_ILGL_PRVU_INFO01M1 WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY LNDS_UNQ_NO ORDER BY MAX(OCRN_DATES) DESC NULLS LAST, MAX(ILGL_PRVU_INFO_SEQ) DESC ) t ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.ILGL_ATTFL_SEQ as ilglAttflSeq, a.ILGL_PRVU_ADDR_SEQ as ilglPrvuAddrSeq, a.ATTFL_NM as attflNm, a.ATTFL_PATH as attflPath, a.ATTFL_CPCT as attflCpct, a.OCRN_DATES as ocrnDates FROM T_LNDS_ILGL_ATTFL01M1 a WHERE a.ILGL_PRVU_ADDR_SEQ = #{ilglPrvuInfoSeq} ORDER BY a.ILGL_ATTFL_SEQ DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT LNDS_UNQ_NO FROM T_LNDS_ILGL_PRVU_INFO01M1 WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
AND LNDS_LDNO_ADDR LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
GROUP BY LNDS_UNQ_NO )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_LNDS_ILGL_PRVU_INFO01M1 SET GPS_LGTD = #{gpsLgtd}, GPS_LTTD = #{gpsLttd}, LNDS_UNQ_NO = #{lndsUnqNo}, LNDS_LDNO_ADDR = #{lndsLdnoAddr}, HDQR_NM = #{hdqrNm}, MTNOF_NM = #{mtnofNm}, ROUTE_CD = #{routeCd}, DRVE_DRCT_CD = #{drveDrctCd}, ROUTE_DSTNC = #{routeDstnc}, STRC_CLSS_CD = #{strcClssCd}, OCRN_DATES = #{ocrnDates}, PRCH_EMNO = #{prchEmno}, TRNR_NM = #{trnrNm}, RLTR_NM = #{rltrNm}, TRNR_ADDR = #{trnrAddr}, RLTR_ADDR = #{rltrAddr}, ILGL_PSSRT = #{ilglPssrt}, ILGL_PSSN_SQMS = #{ilglPssnSqms}, ILGL_PRVU_ACTN_STAT_VAL = #{ilglPrvuActnStatVal}, LSTTM_MODFR_ID = #{lsttmModfrId}, LSTTM_ALTR_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE ILGL_PRVU_INFO_SEQ = #{ilglPrvuInfoSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT ILGL_ACTN_CTNT_SEQ as ilglActnCtntSeq, ILGL_PRVU_INFO_SEQ as ilglPrvuInfoSeq, ACTN_DTTM as actnDttm, ACTN_CTNT as actnCtnt, FSTTM_RGSR_ID as fsttmRgsrId, FSTTM_RGST_DTTM as fsttmRgstDttm, LSTTM_MODFR_ID as lsttmModfrId, LSTTM_ALTR_DTTM as lsttmAltrDttm, USE_YN as useYn FROM T_LNDS_ILGL_ACTN_CTNT01M1 WHERE ILGL_PRVU_INFO_SEQ = #{basicInfoId} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY ACTN_DTTM DESC
mapper.delete: UPDATE T_LNDS_ILGL_ACTN_CTNT01M1 SET USE_YN = 'N', LSTTM_ALTR_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE ILGL_PRVU_INFO_SEQ = #{basicInfoId}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_LNDS_ILGL_PRVU_INFO01M1 SET USE_YN = 'N', LSTTM_MODFR_ID = #{lsttmModfrId}, LSTTM_ALTR_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE ILGL_PRVU_INFO_SEQ = #{ilglPrvuInfoSeq} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT OCRN_DATES AS ocrnDates, PRCH_EMNO AS prchEmno, ILGL_PRVU_INFO_SEQ AS ilglPrvuInfoSeq FROM T_LNDS_ILGL_PRVU_INFO01M1 WHERE LNDS_UNQ_NO = #{lndsUnqNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY OCRN_DATES DESC, ILGL_PRVU_INFO_SEQ DESC

SELECT a.ILGL_ATTFL_SEQ AS ilglAttflSeq, a.OCRN_DATES AS ocrnDates, p.ILGL_PRVU_INFO_SEQ AS ilglPrvuInfoSeq, p.PRCH_EMNO AS prchEmno, a.ATTFL_NM AS attflNm, a.ATTFL_PATH AS attflPath FROM T_LNDS_ILGL_ATTFL01M1 a INNER JOIN T_LNDS_ILGL_PRVU_INFO01M1 p ON a.ILGL_PRVU_ADDR_SEQ = p.ILGL_PRVU_INFO_SEQ WHERE p.LNDS_UNQ_NO = #{lndsUnqNo} AND p.USE_YN = 'Y' AND a.OCRN_DATES IS NOT NULL ORDER BY a.OCRN_DATES DESC, a.ILGL_ATTFL_SEQ DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_LNDS_ILGL_PRVU_INFO01M1 WHERE LNDS_UNQ_NO = #{lndsUnqNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT ILGL_PRVU_INFO_SEQ as ilglPrvuInfoSeq, GPS_LGTD as gpsLgtd, GPS_LTTD as gpsLttd, LNDS_UNQ_NO as lndsUnqNo, LNDS_LDNO_ADDR as lndsLdnoAddr, HDQR_NM as hdqrNm, MTNOF_NM as mtnofNm, ROUTE_CD as routeCd, DRVE_DRCT_CD as drveDrctCd, ROUTE_DSTNC as routeDstnc, STRC_CLSS_CD as strcClssCd, OCRN_DATES as ocrnDates, PRCH_EMNO as prchEmno, TRNR_NM as trnrNm, RLTR_NM as rltrNm, TRNR_ADDR as trnrAddr, RLTR_ADDR as rltrAddr, ILGL_PSSRT as ilglPssrt, ILGL_PSSN_SQMS as ilglPssnSqms, ILGL_PRVU_ACTN_STAT_VAL as ilglPrvuActnStatVal, FSTTM_RGSR_ID as fsttmRgsrId, FSTTM_RGST_DTTM as fsttmRgstDttm, LSTTM_MODFR_ID as lsttmModfrId, LSTTM_ALTR_DTTM as lsttmAltrDttm, USE_YN as useYn FROM T_LNDS_ILGL_PRVU_INFO01M1 WHERE ILGL_PRVU_INFO_SEQ = #{ilglPrvuInfoSeq} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT a.ILGL_ATTFL_SEQ as ilglAttflSeq, a.ILGL_PRVU_ADDR_SEQ as ilglPrvuAddrSeq, a.ATTFL_NM as attflNm, a.ATTFL_PATH as attflPath, a.ATTFL_CPCT as attflCpct, a.OCRN_DATES as ocrnDates FROM T_LNDS_ILGL_ATTFL01M1 a WHERE a.ILGL_PRVU_ADDR_SEQ = #{ilglPrvuInfoSeq} ORDER BY a.ILGL_ATTFL_SEQ DESC
